channel.title: Stupid Question On Isle 3
channel.description: I'm using Pvpscape and this is probably a freakishly stupid question to all you expert coders and such, but when I use the runserver batch file it says starting on 0.0.0.0:43594, how do I change the IP I want it to start the server on? Somebody help me in my stupid ignorance! Thanks in advance, Sha Owned [br][size=1]Posted on: January 15, 2007, 09:44:03 AM[/size][hr]can nobody answer this?

item.title: Stupid Question On Isle 3
item.dc:creator: @Narbscape Narbscape
item.description:
@Narbscape wrote:

oh i c. ok go to ur acct status in no-ip.org and make a server ip such as name.no-ip.info and put ur ip in the box, and it should work in abotu 5 mins, if u need a tester, I can help

Read full topic

item.title: Stupid Question On Isle 3
item.dc:creator: @Narbscape Narbscape
item.description:
@Narbscape wrote:

no, if you want other people to log onto your server you either need a router or hamachi.

do u have a router?

REPLY: you have ur no-ip already, u need to do some portforwarding on your router, if you have one.

Read full topic

item.title: Stupid Question On Isle 3
item.dc:creator: @Sha_Owned Sha Owned
item.description:
@Sha_Owned wrote:

Ok, got it. but do other people log in my server on the 127 ip?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 15, 2007, 03:52:39 PM[/size][hr]Oh, and I have an account on no-ip. but I dont really understand all the guides and stuff, ive done mostly everything i just need to know how other peeps get in my server

Read full topic

item.title: Stupid Question On Isle 3
item.dc:creator: @Narbscape Narbscape
item.description:
@Narbscape wrote:

you don’t

it means that when you start the runserver, it will start 127.0.0.1 by default, eve though it says 0.0.0.0

this is a good thing, log in to 127.0.0.1 on port 43594 and you’re on your server

If you want to change the port: go into server.java and do a search on 43594 and change the FIRST number 43594 you get, the one before //
change it to whatever port you want it to be.

If you want to connect to your server on a different ip, the use hamachi, or go to no-ip.com if you need more help just ask

Read full topic

item.title: Stupid Question On Isle 3
item.dc:creator: @Sha_Owned Sha Owned
item.description:
@Sha_Owned wrote:

I’m using Pvpscape and this is probably a freakishly stupid question to all you expert coders and such, but when I use the runserver batch file it says starting on 0.0.0.0:43594, how do I change the IP I want it to start the server on?
Somebody help me in my stupid ignorance!
Thanks in advance,
Sha Owned
[br][size=1]Posted on: January 15, 2007, 09:44:03 AM[/size][hr]can nobody answer this?
